long_description: This Seirus(R) Masque is an essential for extreme cold weather or windy ski conditions--compact design is easy to stow in your pocket. Neofleece(R), fleece-lined neoprene, offers soft, warm, moisture-wicking, windproof face protection that continues to insulate even if wet. Vent holes for nose and mouth allow easy breathing and prevent moisture buildup. Fully adjustable with a VELCRO(R) brand closure for a comfortable fit.
